lore: Most intelligent beings think highly of the Spacecats, though some suspect they're secretly plotting to take over other nations.\n\nDuring their journey through hyperspace, some Spacecats suffered severe shocks from unexpected quantum distortions. Now they've lost all sense of reason and become dangerously aggressive. Luckily, a special device can channel their fury toward a target â€” and even put them to sleep when needed.
menagerieDialog: (It's curled up in a floating ball, purring contentedly.)
Time to show these earthlings what a real predator looks like!
I've seen things you people wouldn't believe. Want to hear about them?
My space suit is impenetrable! Your puny weapons are no match for me!
(It's zooming around in erratic patterns, defying gravity.)
name: Furious Spacecat
